source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_00<tab>The glee in Anogg's eyes at the sight of 2P's awakening could only be born of keen self-interest. It would not be wise to keep her waiting.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_00<tab>機械遺跡の坑道のアノッグは、２Ｐの復活を喜んでいるようだ。

source:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_01<tab>Sparing but the barest explanation of affairs for the now functional 2P, Anogg immediately solicits the android's help in using the key, which she does all too readily. The ground begins to tremble, and you rush outside to find the village relentlessly bombarded by a number of unknown craft. However, that is far from the only unpleasant surprise, as you soon learn it was 2P herself who brought about the attack, betraying you and your dwarven companions. With your entire party taken off guard by this news, Anogg comes within a hair's breadth of a dire fate at 2P's hands, but thankfully is rescued by a black-garbed android identifying herself as “2B.” Though your faith in androids may not be at its strongest, you have little choice but to ally yourself with 2B as you pursue the nefarious white-garbed group.

※The Puppets' Bunker can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_01<tab>アノッグと話した。再起動した２Ｐが、「鍵」に手をかざすと同時に、坑道内が大きく揺れた。坑道の外に出た一行は、コメラの村の様子を見に行くが、そこで驚くべき光景を目にする。大きく抉れて欠けたドヴェルガル山脈、村を破壊するアンドロイドの集団、逃げ惑う村人たち……。すべては、２Ｐが「計画」のためにアノッグたちを利用して起こしたものであると判明する。２Ｐとよく似た姿のアンドロイド、２Ｂとともに、「人形タチノ軍事基地」を攻略し、２Ｐを止めよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_02<tab>You find that the white-garbed androids have fled deep underground, to a strange facility rife with even more technological marvels than the Copied Factory. Many such machines are controlled by hostile androids, and you bring down one after another until you are at last able to confront 2P─or what she has become. Though the agglomeration of what you can only assume to be semi-formed androids will likely haunt your nightmares for years to come, you win the battle...however, with so many mysteries unsolved, it is clear that the war is not yet over.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_02<tab>人形タチノ軍事基地を攻略した。人形タチノ軍事基地の「アノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_03<tab>Having witnessed the reality of the hostile androids' capabilities, Anogg laments her own role in abetting 2P's plans. 2B cuts in, however, claiming responsibility for the catastrophe─and thanks to some well-placed questions from Konogg, you finally obtain a few useful answers about the androids and machine lifeforms. According to 2B, the androids are from another world entirely, and the machine lifeforms are invaders even there. She also believes that the white-garbed androids were created by the machines to fight the original, black-garbed androids as part of their ongoing conflict. What any of this means for the First is difficult to ascertain, but it seems that as the enemy of your enemy, 2B can be considered a friend for now─in which case, the android boy with whom you previously clashed in the Copied Factory may well be too.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_03<tab>アノッグと話した。アノッグは、これまでの自分の行いによって、周りを危険に晒してしまったことを悔いているようだ。２Ｂは、機械生命体との交戦中に破壊され、気づいたらこの世界に現れていたという。彼女によれば、機械生命体とは、異星人が生み出した兵器であり、２Ｂたちヨルハ部隊は、機械生命体に制圧された地球を取り戻すために、戦っているという。２Ｂの話には、要領を得ない部分が多く、コノッグは理解に苦しんだ。機械遺跡の坑道の「コノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_04<tab>Having offered to take 2B to see her presumed ally, Konogg escorts you to where he and Anogg keep the inert android. Perhaps unsurprisingly, Anogg has appropriated yet another part of the excavation tunnels─where, you recall, the siblings weren't ever meant to set foot─and this semi-secret location is where 9S may be found.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_04<tab>「コノッグ」と話した。アノッグの部屋の「２Ｂ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_05<tab>Upon setting eyes on 9S, 2B confirms that he is indeed her comrade, and that his assistance is indispensable if you are to prevail over the machine lifeforms and their own androids. Though Konogg expects that it will be possible to repair 9S in the same fashion you did 2P, he is also sensitive to his sister's considerable distress, and suggests that all might benefit from a brief respite.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SEQ_05<tab>２Ｂと話した。以前、アノッグたちが複製サレタ工場廃墟にて回収した少年型のアンドロイドは、２Ｂの仲間、「９Ｓ」だった。しかし、２Ｐとの戦闘で傷ついた９Ｓは、かつての２Ｐのように活動を停止している。彼を再起動させることが、コノッグたちの目的となりそうだが、肝心のアノッグは、意気消沈しているようだった。
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_TODO_00<tab>「人形タチノ軍事基地」を攻略

TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_001<tab>ついに２Ｐを復活させることができたな！
ハッハッハ！
この結果も、ワレワレのたゆまぬ努力の結果だな！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_002<tab>Let's not waste any more time about it─2P, do you remember what happened?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_002<tab>まずは２Ｐが無事に起動したのかを確認しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_050<tab>I hope that the part replacement won't result in memory loss. We have too many unanswered questions.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_050<tab>本当に人間そっくりの動き……
いったいどんな技術で生み出されたんだろう。

TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_POD_000_060<tab>アンドロイド機体の修復完了……。
機体の起動を確認。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2P_000_070<tab>I... I was damaged in combat, and you brought me here.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2P_000_070<tab>私はいつからここで活動停止していた……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_071<tab>And then you wildly inconvenienced us by dying on the table, yes.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_071<tab>２Ｐ、キミは機械遺跡での戦闘のあと拠点に戻り、
そのあとすぐに、活動停止してしまったのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_072<tab>Fortunately for you, we were clever enough to pick up Pod here! And by the fact that we're having this conversation, I assume it's succeeded in repairing the damage.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_072<tab>しかし、ワレワレの努力と、このポッドのおかげで、
無事に再起動を果たしたのだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2P_000_073<tab>I see... Did you locate the key as I instructed?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2P_000_073<tab>そうか……ありがとう……。
私が活動停止していた間に、
何か、状況に進展はあったか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_074<tab>Hmph. Despite how little information we had to go on, we did.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_074<tab>あぁ、いまだ黒いアンドロイドや、機械生命体、
その正体を暴くことまではできてないが、
手掛かりになるものは手に入れたぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_075<tab>It's fully operational, as far as we can tell, so...can you use it?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_075<tab>これが、キミの言っていた「鍵」というものなのだろう？
しかし、ワレワレには扱うことができない代物のようだ。
キミなら、この装置の使い方を知っているのではないか？

TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_076<tab>じっ……地震！？
みんな！　ここにいたら危険だ！
外に避難しよう！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_077<tab>The mountain! What happened to the mountain!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_077<tab>山が……無くなってる……！！
爆発したのか！？
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_082<tab>これは……いったいどういうことなんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2P_000_083<tab>It means that your assistance is no longer necessary.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2P_000_083<tab>私の計画のため、貴方達を利用させてもらった。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2P_000_084<tab>Have it your way, then. See this world to its end.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2P_000_084<tab>まあいい……
この世界が滅びるのを、見届けるといい。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_085<tab>I know I worried, but... I thought she was our friend!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_085<tab>２Ｐが……ボク達を騙してたなんて！！
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_086<tab>(-黒き衣の女性-)貴方達は……いったい……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_A1_000_002<tab>Is your dress about to turn white? Because if so...
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_088<tab>I am a YoRHa No.2 Type B unit─but you may call me 2B. I'm here to destroy the androids in white.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_088<tab>私は２Ｂ……ヨルハ機体二号Ｂ型。
白いアンドロイドを、破壊しに来た。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_089<tab>We can discuss this later. Right now, we've got to stop 2P!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_089<tab>詳しいことは後で聞きましょう！
２Ｐはまだ何かやる気だ……
止めないと！！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_140<tab>We've made a fine mess of things, to be sure. But it's hardly the first time. Nothing for it but to fix it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_140<tab>怖くないっていったら嘘になります……
でも、このまま引き下がるわけにはいきません！

TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_145<tab>ワタシは……
いったい、何をしてしまったんだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_150<tab>Careful. They may intend for us to follow.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_150<tab>奴らは私を誘い込んでいるのかもしれない……。
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_POD_000_155<tab>膨大な……エネルギー反応を確認……。
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_255<tab>ひとまず脅威は去ったようだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_260<tab>2P and 2B are identical. How did they come to be on different sides?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_260<tab>２Ｐと２Ｂ……瓜二つだけど……
２Ｂはボク達の味方……なんですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_270<tab>I was wrong. So, <var 1A 02 /var>so<var 1A 01 /var> wrong! I made you go along with my decisions... I put everyone in danger...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_270<tab>ワタシがやってきたことは……間違っていた。
間違った判断で行動して、
みんなを危険に晒してしまった……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_272<tab>I'm the one who let the conflict spread this far. Blaming yourselves is unnecessary.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_272<tab>こちら側の世界を戦いに巻き込んでしまったのは、私の責任。
そんなふうに思い悩むのは、不毛な行為。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_273<tab>Forgive me, but you seem so similar to 2P, and we still don't really understand either of you. Are you truly our ally?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_273<tab>アナタは……２Ｐとよく似ているようですが、
いったい何者なんですか……。
本当にワレワレの味方なんでしょうか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_274<tab>I can't be certain. All I know is that I was damaged in a battle with the machine lifeforms, and then I was here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_274<tab>……わからない。
私は敵である機械生命体との交戦中に破壊され、
気づいたらこの世界に現れていた。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_275<tab>Your world is very...different from where I was. I don't know my coordinates, and I can't contact Command─I just followed the explosions.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_275<tab>元いた戦場とは違う風景。
座標系も不明、基地であるバンカーとの通信もできない。
そんな中、ここの爆発を感知した。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_276<tab>Let's approach this from a different angle, then. What are the machine lifeforms, and why were you fighting them?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_276<tab>違う世界から来た存在……
そもそもアナタ達が戦っている機械生命体というのは、
どのような存在なんですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_277<tab>The machine lifeforms are weapons created by aliens from beyond the stars. As part of YoRHa, my mission is to reclaim the planet from these invaders.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_277<tab>機械生命体は異星人が生み出した兵器。
私達ヨルハ部隊は、機械生命体に制圧された地球を、
取り戻す為に戦っている。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_278<tab>Alien...invaders...? Never mind. What about 2P? As an android, does she not belong to this “YoRHa” as well?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_278<tab>異星人……制圧された地球……？
あの２Ｐというアンドロイドも、
ヨルハ部隊の一員として戦っていたのですか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_279<tab>No. She is a copy, built by the machine lifeforms─probably to fight YoRHa specifically.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_279<tab>いや……あれは、機械生命体が生み出したコピーだ。
私達ヨルハ部隊に対抗すべく開発されたんだと思う。

TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_280<tab>ワレワレはもうひとり別の少年型アンドロイドを、
回収したんですが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_281<tab>If he's still with you, I would like to see him.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_281<tab>……。
貴方達の手元にそのアンドロイドがいるなら、
私を彼のもとへ案内して。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_282<tab>Very well. Can't make things any worse.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_282<tab>そうしたら……一度拠点へ戻りましょうか。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SYSTEM_000_283<tab>A new section has been added to the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Portable Archive<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Fill it by using the device to record data at promising spots within the Puppets' Bunker!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_SYSTEM_000_283<tab>「情報記録端末」に新たな項目が追加されました。
物語に関わりのある場所に点在するデータを探し出して、
「人形タチノ軍事基地」のアーカイブを更新しましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_305<tab>To think he was on our side after all...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_ANOGG_000_305<tab>２Ｐと戦っていた少年のアンドロイドは、
敵ではなかったのか……。

source:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_POD_000_310<tab>Accessing data for YoRHa Type-B unit...
Overwrite previous owner ID?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_POD_000_310<tab>ヨルハＢ型……モデルを検知……。
所有者の上書き登録が可能。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_320<tab>We hid him where 2P wouldn't know to look. Follow me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_320<tab>２Ｂの仲間と思われるアンドロイドは、この先にいます。
ついてきてください。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_350<tab>He's been out of operation since we brought him here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_350<tab>少年のアンドロイドは、
回収したときから活動を停止していますが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_371<tab>My duty is to annihilate the machine lifeforms. For that, I require the assistance of 9S.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_2B_000_371<tab>私達アンドロイドは、機械生命体を殲滅するのが任務。
そのためには、９Ｓの協力が必要不可欠。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_373<tab>Fortunately, we have some experience with this sort of thing. What do you say, Anogg?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_373<tab>……休止しているアンドロイドの再起動、ですか。
こういう展開はどこかで見ましたね。
どうする……？　アノッグ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_375<tab>Er, I'm certain <var 1A 02 /var>everyone<var 1A 01 /var> could use a rest before we proceed. A lot has happened, and we should take time to think things through.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA302_03953_KONOGG_000_375<tab>……とりあえず、次の目標が決まっただけ良しとして、
今は戦いの疲れを癒しましょう。
いろいろありすぎて、もうくたくたです……。
